item.title: Theo Tams - Therapy
item.description:
You know I don’t know why
But everything about you seems
Comfortable to me
Feel like I’m the one
Feel like I’m the only one
Everything else seems small
Babe I don’t know why
But everything about you seems realest to me
Feel like I’m the man
Feel like I’m your only man
And we can get through it all
I don’t wanna need ya
But I don’t wanna leave ya
I just wanna see ya feel ya
And be real yah
I just don’t know how to love you
Just don’t know how to be
Committed to ya baby
So effortlessly
I just don’t know how to love you
The way you need to be
‘Cause I been around
And I been run down yeah
I need therapy
Therapy therapy
I need therapy
Therapy therapy
Sometimes I’m alone late night
Thinkin’ ‘bout the mess I got inside
Ruin the illusion of your Paradise
Sayin’ I won’t change my mind
But I don’t wanna lead ya on
I might wanna be the one
I just wanna see ya feel ya
And be real yah
I just don’t know how to love you
Just don’t know how to be
Committed to ya baby
So effortlessly
I just don’t know how to love you
The way you need to be
‘Cause I been around
And I been run down yeah
I need therapy
Therapy therapy
I need therapy
Therapy therapy
Maybe all I need is a pill or two
A sit down conversation or new attitude
But if there’s a possibility of losing you
I’ll do what I need
What I need
(Don’t know how to love you you)
Oh oh oh(Don’t know how to be)
Therapy
I need therapy(O oh yeah)
Therapy therapy
I need therapy(Do do do do do)
Therapy therapy(O oh)
I need therapy
Therapy therapy
I need therapy(‘Cause I been run down)
Therapy therapy
